messaging real-time react nodejs

The Challenge

Building a scalable real-time messaging system that handles thousands of concurrent users while maintaining low latency and providing rich interactive features.

The Solution

Implemented WebSocket connections with Socket.io, optimized database queries, and used React for efficient UI updates. Added features like typing indicators, message reactions, and file sharing.
